Articles.Content:
I'm Silas, and I've managed to figure out a stack which will reliably get my Kerbals into orbit. What I can't figure out is how to do more than that, or how to get them up there with more than 'just enough for a deorbit burn' in fuel reserves, but these things will come.

Umpty-ump times the computing power that took Apollo to the moon and back, and we're using it to uplift little green men... ;D

\o/

As far as fuel goes, it's frighteningly easy to overbuild a rocket without getting useful delta-v.

Welcome to the Forums.

Happy Launching!

From CarolRawley, your #1 supplier of things that will crash, burn, and kill your brain.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

(Quit stealing my lines Carol, don't make me get out my stick! 8) )
